Class ActorManager

java.lang.Object
Managers.ActorManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollisionManager
public class ActorManager extends Object
Manages all active actors (friendly units, enemy units, projectiles) in the game, handling updates and removal of destroyed actors. Source Code: GitHub Link

  • Constructor Details

    • ActorManager

      public ActorManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Constructs a new `ActorManager`.
      Parameters:
      root - The root `Group` to which all actors are added.
      screenWidth - The screen width for managing actors' positions.

  • Method Details

    • GetActorManager

      public static ActorManager GetActorManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Retrieves the singleton instance of `ActorManager`.
      Parameters:
      root - The root `Group` to which all actors are added.
      screenWidth - The screen width for managing actors' positions.
      Returns:
      The `ActorManager` instance.

    • UpdateActorManager

      private void UpdateActorManager(javafx.scene.Group root, double screenWidth)
      Updates the `ActorManager` instance with a new root and screen width.
      Parameters:
      root - The new root `Group` to which all actors are added.
      screenWidth - The new screen width for managing actors' positions.

    • ResetList

      public void ResetList()
      Clears all lists of actors, resetting the state of the `ActorManager`.

    • FriendlyActor

      public void FriendlyActor()
      Adds the user plane to the list of friendly units.

    • updateActors

      public void updateActors()
      Updates all actors in the game.

    • removeAllDestroyedActors

      public void removeAllDestroyedActors()
      Removes all destroyed actors from the game.

    • removeDestroyedActors

      public void removeDestroyedActors(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors)
      Removes destroyed actors from a list and updates the root `Group`.
      Parameters:
      actors - The list of actors to check and remove.

    • updateKillCount

      public void updateKillCount()
      Updates the kill count based on the number of destroyed enemies.

    • addEnemyUnit

      public void addEnemyUnit(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Adds an enemy unit to the game.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The `ActiveActorDestructible` instance to add.

    • getCurrentNumberOfEnemies

      public int getCurrentNumberOfEnemies()
      Gets the current number of enemies.
      Returns:
      The size of the `enemyUnits` list.

    • updateNumberOfEnemies

      public void updateNumberOfEnemies()
      Updates the number of enemies managed.
